title: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
description: Even when the "Perform build automatically on resource modification" option is selected in Preferences > Workbench, the "Build" action is still enabled in the context sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective. This behavior is incorrect and should be fixed.
OB: The "Build" action in the context sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even if the user selects "Perform build automatically on resource modification" in Preferences > Workbench.
EB: The "Build" action in the context sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should only be enabled if the user has not selected "Perform build automatically on resource modification" in Preferences > Workbench.
SR:
1. Open the Java perspective.
2. Go to Preferences > Workbench.
3. Select "Perform build automatically on resource modification".
4. Observe the context sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective.
Expected: The "Build" action should be disabled.
Actual: The "Build" action is still enabled.
